resources.string: Hi, I am Friday your Virtual Assistant. How can i help you ? Please tap to Speak...
Leave product feedback or share your ideas
This app provide some services to user to know how to use this app. Please hit the Start button to start tutorial....
This simple app is designed to support call service to user.There are two way to use this app.Follow these steps to use this app...
First, to call someone with any number then say "Call 'Any Number' ". These will the call specific number.
Second, to call someone with by name then say "Call 'Person Name' ". These will the call to specific person.
These app provide service and understand natural language voice commands and complete tasks for the user
